achievements.description: Nuclear Strike another faction in the Red Death scenario

achievements.name: Have Them Do Unto You
achievements.description: Get nuked by another faction in the Red Death scenario

achievements.name: Reinforcements Have Arrived
achievements.description: Claim a Supply Drop in the Red Death scenario

achievements.name: The Good Die Young
achievements.description: Lose your last Civilian within the first ten turns in the Red Death scenario

achievements.name: The stars are right
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Lady Six Sky.

achievements.name: El Libertador
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Simón Bolívar.

achievements.name: Court of Itzamna
achievements.description: As the Maya found a settlement adjacent to 4 luxury resources.

achievements.name: To plow the sea
achievements.description: As Simón Bolívar activate all the Comandante Generals across multiple games.

achievements.name: I'll melt with you
achievements.description: Win any Victory with Apocalypse mode enabled.

achievements.name: The end of the world as we know it
achievements.description: Be the last person standing after comets begin falling.

achievements.name: The accursed share
achievements.description: Use a max-promotions Soothsayer to sacrifice a max-promotions GDR.

achievements.name: Ashes of Time
achievements.description: Wanderers - Explore 30 city ruins across multiple games.

achievements.name: Experience Is Everything
achievements.description: Preppers - Have 5 units earn 5 promotions across multiple games.

achievements.name: It's Alive!
achievements.description: Mad Scientists - Heal 1000 health points across multiple games.

achievements.name: Hope Springs Eternal
achievements.description: Be defeated 5 times in the Red Death scenario.

achievements.name: From the Outer Darkness
achievements.description: Mutants - Attack a unit outside the Red Death while inside the Red Death 20 times.

achievements.name: Getting Pruney
achievements.description: Pirates - Spend 50 turns in the water across multiple games.

achievements.name: U mad, bro?
achievements.description: Borderlords - Trick enemy factions into triggering Grieving Gifts 5 times across multiple games.

achievements.name: It Hungers
achievements.description: Cultists - Kill 10 units with the Undying Eye.

achievements.name: NERDS!
achievements.description: Jocks - Use Hail Marys to wound, but not kill, 5 Civilians across multiple games.

achievements.name: They're coming to get you, Barbara
achievements.description: Zombie Beastmasters - Spawn 30 Zombie Hordes through combat kills.

achievements.name: Out of Sight, Out of Mind
achievements.description: Aliens - Attack while cloaked 20 times.

achievements.name: The Lion of Judah
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Menelik II.

achievements.name: Battle of Adwa
achievements.description: Defeat an Infantry unit whose capital is on another continent with an Oromo Cavalry.

achievements.name: The Mask of Baphomet
achievements.description: Earn all Governor promotions for the Owls of Minerva Secret Society.

achievements.name: Voice of Aiwass
achievements.description: Earn all Governor promotions for the Hermetic Order Secret Society.

achievements.name: Dead But Dreaming
achievements.description: Earn all Governor promotions for the Voidsingers Secret Society.

achievements.name: This Blood is the Life
achievements.description: Earn all Governor promotions for the Sanguine Pact Secret Society.

achievements.name: One Eye in One Hundred
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Basil II.

achievements.name: Et tu, Gallia?
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Ambiorix.

achievements.name: Rome is Where the Heart is
achievements.description: As Byzantium, take the original capital of Rome while it is following your founded religion.

achievements.name: Crom Laughs at Your Tanks
achievements.description: As Gaul, kill a Tank with a Gaesatae.

achievements.name: Things Fall Apart
achievements.description: In Dramatic Ages Mode, lose 4 or more cities by entering a Dark Age.

achievements.name: The City Ever-Shining
achievements.description: In Dramatic Ages Mode, enter a Golden Age with an excess 20 Era Score

achievements.name: No Light Without the Dark
achievements.description: In Dramatic Age Mode, as Georgia, have simultaneously a Golden and a Dark Policy active.

achievements.name: The Abyss is Hungry
achievements.description: Dread Pirate - Sink 10 ships while using Walk the Plank across multiple games.

achievements.name: Naval Supremacy
achievements.description: Privateer - Ensure that your patron has a naval fleet twice the size of any other colonial power.

achievements.name: Port in Every Storm
achievements.description: Swashbuckler - Visit the tavern of 10 ports in a single game.

achievements.name: Love It When a Plan Comes Together
achievements.description: Hoarder - Sink or capture a treasure ship while a treasure escort is locked by a chainshot.

achievements.name: I am a Pirate King!
achievements.description: Win the Pirates scenario.

achievements.name: Forced Retirement
achievements.description: Lose the Pirates scenario due to mutiny.

achievements.name: Liquid Assets
achievements.description: Sink or capture a treasure ship.

achievements.name: Mine! Mine! Mine!
achievements.description: Win the Pirates scenario using mostly Treasure Points.

achievements.name: I am Kind of a Big Deal
achievements.description: Win the Pirates scenario using mostly Infamous Pirate Points.

achievements.name: I Want You to Hit Me as Hard as You Can
achievements.description: Win the Pirates scenario using mostly Fightin' Points.

achievements.name: Babylon Rocker
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Hammurabi.

achievements.name: Let's Do the Time Warp Again
achievements.description: As Babylon, earn 5 tech boosts for techs that are at least one era later than your current era.

achievements.name: Sing, O Muse
achievements.description: Claim every Hero across multiple games.

achievements.name: Clash of the Titans
achievements.description: Kill an enemy Hero with your Hero.

achievements.name: The Brave Live Forever
achievements.description: Recall a Hero 5 times in a single game.

achievements.name: Steel-Driving Man
achievements.description: Recall a Hero after the Industrial Era.

achievements.name: The Dream Team
achievements.description: Claim 5 Heroes in a single game.

achievements.name: I will not bend my back
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Bà Triệu.

achievements.name: For he on honey-dew hath fed
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Kublai Khan.

achievements.name: Top Hat and Monocle
achievements.description: Control a 100% Monopoly on a given Luxury Resource on a Standard sized map or larger.

achievements.name: Jack of all Trades, Master of None
achievements.description: Win a game on a Standard sized map or larger with 5 or more Industries, but no Corporations.

achievements.name: Robber Baron
achievements.description: Control 5 Luxury Resource Monopolies at once on a Standard sized map or larger.

achievements.name: Limited Edition
achievements.description: Hire a unique unit from a Barbarian Clan.

achievements.name: Finder's Fee
achievements.description: Ransom 5 units from Barbarian Clans in a single game.

achievements.name: Frenemies
achievements.description: Hire, Bribe, Incite, and Raid the same Barbarian Clan.

achievements.name: The Spice Must Flow
achievements.description: Win a regular game as João III.

achievements.name: Ultramar Português
achievements.description: As Portugal, have a Trading Post in cities belonging to Brazil, India, and Japan.

achievements.name: Re-Animator
achievements.description: Control at least 20 Zombie units at the start of your turn.

achievements.name: Well Hello Mr. Fancypants
achievements.description: Destroy a Zombie unit that has +50 or more Mutation Strength.

achievements.name: It's a Trap!!!
achievements.description: Deal 50 or more damage to a single unit from trap damage on a single tile in one turn.

achievements.name: Salad Sensation
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Julius Caesar

achievements.name: Addressing Gettysburg
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Abraham Lincoln

achievements.name: The Self-Made Throne
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Nzinga Mbande

achievements.name: I Will Wait
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Tokugawa

achievements.name: Claimants of the Peacock Throne
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Nader Shah

achievements.name: Live Yongle Reaction
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Yongle

achievements.name: Mother’s Day
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Wu Zetian

achievements.name: Valley of Kings
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Ramses II

achievements.name: Dawn of a Dynasty
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Sundiata Keita

achievements.name: Father of Korean Literature
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Sejong

achievements.name: Partial Completionist
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Ludwig II

achievements.name: The Power Beside the Throne
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Theodora

achievements.name: The Triumphs of Oriana
achievements.description: Win a regular game as Elizabeth I
